other_tests.findings: An 8-mm atrial septal defect with dilation of the right atrium and ventricle; left ventricular functions were normal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Control echocardiography showed an enlarged left main coronary artery with a marked colour Doppler flow from the left coronary region to the right atrium.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated a coronary AV fistula from the left coronary artery to the right atrium.
Did not detect any mutations related to Holt-Oram syndrome and Fanconi anaemia.
Did not reveal chromosomal abnormalities for trisomy disorders.
